inclusion.criterion: early uni- or bilateral defect in pars interarticularis in the CT-scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of bony sclerosis on CT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bone marrow edema in lumbar spinal MR images
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: systemic skeletal disorder or lack of interest
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, but meets inclusion criteria for spondylolysis study.
